title: Motion Design: Touch UI Considerations
content: We recently posted a motion piece illustrating our touch UI design considerations. Enjoy. [Punchcut Perspective: Considerations for Designing Touch UI](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082027/http:/vimeo.com/4206140) from [Punchcut](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082027/http:/vimeo.com/punchcut) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082027/http:/vimeo.com/). Designing for touch-based mobile user interfaces requires new thinking and an expanded design vocabulary. If you're interested in the subject, read Jared Benson's write-up on the [Punchcut blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20090429082027/http:/idlemode.com/2009/04/17/design-considerations-for-touch-ui-visualized/).
author: Joe Pemberton
